resources.string: Evil mode is when the computer turns evil and he feels no one can beat him. Can you beat the computer in this mode?
How Can I Play Tough Game !?

Hangman is a paper and pencil guessing game for two or more players. One player thinks of a word, phrase or sentence and the other tries to guess it by suggesting letters or numbers, within a certain number of guesses.

Evil Hangman is a twisted version of Hangman. Once you guess a letter, the computer tries to neglect all the words with that letter. YES IT CHEATS! That is probably why this game is so tough :D

I hope you WIN someday :P

All the best and if you do WIN, take time to pat your back! Yeah, that's an achievement. :P
